title: Fiend Patron

source.file: docs/sources/phb2024/04-chapter 3/05-Character Classes (Continued) - PlayeraTMs Handbook - Dungeons & Dragons - Sources - D&D Beyond.pdf

feature_defs.trigger: when you or a creature within 10 feet reduces an enemy to 0 hit points
effects: You gain temporary hit points equal to your Charisma modifier + your Warlock level (minimum 1).
You always have the spells in the Fiend Spells table prepared at the warlock levels shown.

feature_defs.trigger: when you make an ability check or saving throw
effects: You can add 1d10 to the roll (after seeing the roll but before any effects occur).
limits: You can use this feature a number of times equal to your Charisma modifier (minimum 1), no more than once per roll, and you regain all expended uses when you finish a long rest.

feature_defs.trigger: when you finish a short or long rest
effects: Choose one damage type other than force; you have resistance to that type until you choose a different one with this feature.

feature_defs.trigger: once per turn when you hit a creature with an attack roll
effects: The target must make a Charisma save against your spell save DC or be transported through the Lower Planes.
On a failed save, the target takes 8d10 psychic damage (if it isnt a fiend), is Incapacitated until the end of your next turn, and returns to its previous space or the nearest unoccupied space.
limits: Once you use this feature, you cant use it again until you finish a long rest unless you expend a Pact Magic spell slot (no action required) to restore its use.

notes: Normalized from HTML rules text into concise clauses.
